duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and develop after-school workshops with a focus on life skills and personal development, forging a path to educational enrichment.
Prepare the materials, structure, and guidelines to transform workshops into interactive experiences for all participants.
Command the room as you lead workshops, igniting participation and engagement from both students and families.
Fostering mastery of valuable life skills through educational after-school workshops, while providing a fun and satisfying learning experience to kids.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Education, Child Development, or a related field (Master's Preferred)
